public void setLineColor(Color lineColor)
Sets the color of the point marker's outline. When null, the series' or point's color is used. Defaults to "#FFFFFF".

setSymbol

public void setSymbol(MarkerSymbol symbol)
Sets a predefined shape or symbol for the marker. When null, the symbol is pulled from options.symbols. Defaults to null.
